text: Karin Balzer (née Richert, 5 June 1938 – 17 December 2019) was a East German hurdler. She competed in the 80 m hurdles event at the 1960, 1964 and 1968 Olympics, and in the 100 m hurdles in 1972. She won a gold medal in 1964 and a bronze in 1972. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1938 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for East Germany Category:Olympic bronze medalists for East Germany Category:German hurdlers Category:People from Magdeburg
title: Karin Balzer
